Replies.Reply: It's true then.  I must tell Queen Bavmorda.
Ethna, please.  Help me.  They're going to kill my baby.
Yes.  But nothing you can do will stop the prophecy.
We will start the ritual at dusk.
I must see for myself!  Just as the omen foretold!
This child will have no power over me....
Find that baby!  Use the dogs!
Purify the altar!  Arrange the im-
You dare to challenge me?  You are not warriors.  You're pigs!
Begin the ritual.  Now!  Light the first candle.
Dark runes, dark powers!  Blend and bind, bind and blend, Universal night!  And the might of Nockmaar!
Black fire forever kindled within, Let the second right begin!
You are a weakling.  Like you fa-
My ritual will kill the prophecy!
And who will stop me?  The elements are slaves to my command!
As above, so below!  Universe of evil, Raziel!  It conquers even you!
Willow stops.  He turns around.  Bavmorda towers over him, grotesque, monstrous, poised to destroy Willow with her magic.
Is that the extent of your power?
By ritual, by sorcery, I well draw the lightning and send this child into the destructive realm.
Even I don't have the power to do that.  You're a fraud.
I don't have her!  No!  No!
Dada!  We found something in the river!
I could be you rguard!  I could carry your spear!
I can't run off and play with you now.  I've got work to do.
Back!  Don't go near it.  We don't know where it's been.  It could be diseased.
No, it's too big to be a Nelwyn baby.  It looks like a daikini...
Mims!  Get back here!  It might bite you.
In the forest.  My family's been gathering them since last fall.
Absolutely, under no condition, is anyone in this family going to fall in love with that baby.
Kiaya!  We can't keep that baby.
This is bad.  If we're caught with that little daikini it'll be the end of us.  Careful, Ranon, I need that for the festival.
Kiaya, what are we going to do?
Burglekutt's right.  There's not enough time to finish plowing.
No, no!  They'll think it's a bad omen.  There'll be a flood or a drought or a plague and everybody'll blame me for it!
I don't know.  This is trouble.
And now!  For our final amazing bit of magic, I will make an entire pig completely disappear!
Meegosh, can you watch the chil-
Sir!  I have to talk to you.
It's a matter of great importance to me!
We can't keep this baby, Kiaya.  We must take her to the Council.
My family found this baby in the river, High Aldwin.
They'll kill her!  We can't let this baby die!
I can't do it!  I haven't put my crop in!
Daikinis are giant people who live far far away.
What a great son you are, Ranon.  I wish I could take you with me.  Now go to sleep...
If I'm not strong enough to be your apprentice, how can I do this?
I don't want courage.  I don't want to be a warrior.  All I've ever wanted was to do magic, real magic, like you!
Oh, if I could do that I'd--I'd turn Burglekutt into a toad!
I hate this.  Where am I?  I should stick you in a tree and go back home.
I'm sorry.  I didn't mean that.
I will--I'll getcha water--getcha lotsa water--anything you say--!
Good.  How long will it take?
You be careful.  I'm a powerful sorcerer.  I could turn you into a toad just like that.
Do any other daikinis ever come by here?
I have to give this baby to some-
No.  Somebdoy put you in there for a reason.  I'll wait for somebody else.
Don't call me a Peck.  My name is Willow.
Nooo, I don't think I should.
Sir!  Sir!  I have this baby.  We found her in our village.  Will you take her...?
You don't know anything about ba-
You gotta promise to feed her.
And give her a bath everyday, and don't let her get cold.  And keep her diaper changed.
Here are her diaper rags.  And this is her milk bladder.  And when she cries--she's either hungry or she's tired--rock her on your left shoulder.  She likes that.
Please take good care of her.
Look, it's Willow Ufgood!  He's come home!  Welcome back, Willow!
Come back here, you!  That's my baby!!
Where am I?  Where's the baby?
I'm getting her out of there!
I can't go out there with the baby!
I can't see anything--she's too bright!
You mean, you know who this baby belongs to?
What a relief.  Now I can go home.
Where is Tir Asleen?  How far is it?
You need a warrior for this job.
No I'm not.  Have you really looked at me?
I'm short!  Even for a Nelwyn!
Why can't you do it?  You have mag-
But I've got a family to think about!  They need me!
I'll do it.  Yes, I will, I'll do it!
But I only have one shoe.
Wait till I tell my children.
How do these work I wonder?  I got-
Let's get out of here.  Shhh, don't cry, Elora.  Things can't get any worse than this...
Don't worry--I'm a sorcerer.  What could possibly happen?
Could you spare some milk for this poor hungry baby?
I could use your help, boys.
Let's get out of here before they come back.
Yes it does.  The Fairy Queen told me.
We're in trouble!  You've seen the big army that's after us!  You're a fake!  You're a bum!  You're a--
I miss my wife!  I miss my chil-
Or maybe you wouldn't.  You don't know anything about love.  You don't know anything about any-
How are we going to get out there?
We need to get out to that island.
We've traveled a long way.  We're looking for Fin Raziel.

I'm Willow Ufgood.  I'm here to find Fin Raziel.
This can't be right.  This isn't a sorceress.  This is some kind of animal.

If you rest the baby on your shoulder, she'll stop crying.
What do I need for that?
I hope she's all right.  How much more do I have to do of this?
I know, and the magician's goal is to find his true self.  But what's this got to do with it?
The universe is a living creature, like you and me, Madmartigan.
How am I gonna do that?
She needs to be changed again.
I don't know much about him.
Uh, yes.  It's very nice hair.
I did it!  I got the ashes!
You're crazy.  I think you're in love.
I must concetrate my imagination...to creat a new...reality!
I can't remember all these things.

I just wanted to test it first.
Madmartigan.  Let's go.  Let's get Eloran Danan.
What are you doing?  Get out of there...!
We're taking her to Tir Asleen.
Madmartigan!  I can't stand being in closed-in places.
I'm used to her.  How's she doing?
She can't be wrong.  She's a very very very powerful sorceress.

I did it!  Madmartigan!  Come here!
I feel like I could do anything!

I know, I know!  But this is a way to get into that castle...
Madmartigan, you promised me you'd take care of Elora Danan like your own daughter.  She is all that matters.  Are you going to abandon her?
I'm Willow Ufgood.  I'm a magician.

You haven't paid your debts.  Where did you get these seeds?
Too late, Ufgood.  You'll never get your planting done before the rains start.  You're gonna lose this land.
An evil beast from the outer world has invaded our peaceful village, looking for a baby!
Silence!  One beast we can kill.
That's what the beasts want!  Give it back!
He's right!  It seems only fair that the man to take this baby to the crossroads...
...be the very man who plucked it...

Willow, do you think we should take her to the Village Council?

Now Burglekutt's got you in the squeeze.  Soon you'll be down in the mines like me.
You know I'll help you as much as I can, Willow.

Now, you know where you're going?

We've patrolled the hills.  This is where they killed the nursemaid.
She must have done something with the child.  Widen the search!
You!  Are you the mother of that child?
Raziel.  Did you think my mother would allow you to escape?
This is what we're looking for.  It bears the markings.
We'll join the column.  Bring them with us.
Wolff wants to boil you in oil.
My step-father's going to tear you apart.
This baby won't do what I say.  You seem to know what to do.  Here!
Who is that horrible friend of yours?
He's very bold.  Do you really think my hair is beautiful?

Here.  You're going to need these where we're going.

I won't let you kill her!

No, you fool!  Put it out I say!

I'm strving.  I got no used for it.
The greatest swordsman that ever lived.

Nothing you wouldn't have done it my place!

Willow.  You can't let me die here.
Don't worry, Willow.  She's in good hands.  You haven't made a mistake.
You've done a great job.  Now you go back to your family and get your crop in.
Where the hell did you come from?
Now Willow, I know you're gonna blame me for this but it wasn't my fault...!
When I left the crossroads, I got ambushed by an elf!
I mean, of course I saved her life.

Yeah me.  King!  But she betrayed me.  She robbed me of my dream.
I'll never fall in love again...

It's nothing to do with you.

I'm torn apart already.  I mean it!

Willow!  Willow!  Are you all right?

Is this what's left of your army?
